data.headline: The Times & The Sunday Times
data.intro: The newspaper of record, and the only newspaper that can be quoted in an English court of law. Founded in 1785. How do you move such an institution into the digital age? By being part of a global, distributed team that embarks on a huge digital transformation project using cutting edge technologies.
data.tech: React, Flow, GraphQL (AWS AppSync), Serverless Framework
data.highlights: Rolling out the new Channels pages, allowing for an increase in ad revenue and a richer user experience.

data.headline: Local Opportunity with Google
data.intro: Encouraging business owners to take advantage of their Google My Business listings and make the most of them.
data.highlights: Working alongside an A-Team consisting of Steve Hall, Andy Bridges, and Ryan Grieve - all wildly talented developers.

data.headline: Learn With Facebook
data.intro: A interactive education portal, built upon React and WordPress, with the aim of training 1 million people and small businesses in the U.S. in digital skills by 2020. Since amalgamated into the Facebook Blueprint platform.
data.highlights: Being involved from inception, through technical architecture and delivery, eventually leading front end development. Launching a multilingual site to 4 regions.

data.headline: McLaren.com
data.intro: 2 seasons spent at one of the greatest Formula One teams in motorsport, including launches of the MP4-30 and MP4-31
data.highlights: Being responsible for the live telemetry feed to the website, served to thousands of online viewers.

data.headline: The Whisky Emoji
data.intro: There wasn't a whisky emoji, so we made one.
data.highlights: Having my proposal accepted by Unicode and adopted by all manufacturers.

data.headline: Ballantine's Space Glass
data.intro: A mad idea to invent a zero-gravity whisky glass, brought to reality. Tested in the microgravity chamber at the University of Bremen, used by the European Space Agency.
data.highlights: Organising a shoot and taking the team to Germany to test the culmination of 18 months worth of research.
